body_html:
Ok, I figured it out, the wrapper was wrong (should not import pybind11 but torch headers).

Correct example:

#include <torch/torch.h>
#include "RoiPooling.cpp"

PYBIND11_MODULE(TORCH_EXTENSION_NAME, m) {
  m.def("RoiPooling2d_forward_cpu", &at::native::RoiPooling2d_forward_cpu, "RoiPooling2d_forward_cpu");
}
